description: Mixed, uncategorised or infrequent contacts. May include clients, prospective buyers, acquaintances, infrequent suppliers, service providers and other undefined contacts. High variability in both call frequency and call duration.
example_contacts: One-off callers, rare repeat numbers, mixed behaviour

description: Relatives and close family members. Typically long and frequent personal calls, including off-peak, evening and weekend activity.
Business suppliers and vendors. Mostly short, task-focused calls during business hours related to stock, logistics, or operations.
example_contacts: Stationery supplier, IT parts vendor, printing shop

description: Key practical and operational contacts who are important to day-to-day functioning but are not institutions. Often involved in coordination, logistics or property-related issues.
example_contacts: Driver, tenant, caretaker, accountant, key helper

description: Formal institutions and service organisations providing services to the business or individual.
example_contacts: Bank, insurance company, SARS, Department of Labour, ambulance, towing company
